alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 28 at 2:01PM PDT until May 30 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Patchy blowing snow on summits and passes. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 1 AM Sunday to 11 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
